trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Anchorage
There were no other sightings in Anchorage on or around October 24th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWas outside looking at night sky, no clouds, no moon, saw 4 stars that formed a rectangle to the NNE (I had not noticed this formation on prior nights), then noticed one "star" was actually moving very slowly, no sound, no colors just white, no blinking. Continued to watch assuming the light was a satellite and would simply continue in a straight line across the sky towards the north. The light continued at same speed & general direction but slowly did a large S shaped turn before fading out. I thought this was very odd as satellites move in straight lines. Total time about 2 minutes. This is the first time I have ever seen something odd like this in the night sky.
Summary: Light in NNE sky, slowly moving straight line north, then slowly did an "S" track & faded out
